original_title: 東京地下女子刑務所 CHAPTER3・エリア0〈ゼロ〉
overview: The third volume of eros suspense that depicts the horrible living hell that unfolds in a secret cell. Momoko, who was arrested for false charges, is transferred to a special rehabilitation facility "Area 0" where problem children are collected. There, a female religion of an emerging religion controls the prisoners and guards with mind control.
title: Tokyo Underground Women's Prison CHAPTER 3・Area 0
